_meta.topic: Interactive pygame game: Chinese HUD + unpause-on-new-goal
commands: conda run -n ros2py310 python -m pip install -r requirements-optional.txt
conda run -n ros2py310 python game.py --profile repro_20260212_interactive_game_ui_cn_v1
conda run -n ros2py310 python game.py --profile repro_20260212_interactive_game_ui_cn_v1 --self-check
notes: HUD uses Chinese text and draws a semi-transparent panel so text remains readable over the map.
After reaching the goal, left-clicking a new goal automatically resumes motion (paused=false).
